fr.header: Quel principe suit la méthode LEAN ?
fr.klf: La méthode LEAN suit le principe d'amélioration continue. À la base de sa philosophie, on trouve du respect, de la volonté de considérer les problèmes comme sources d’amélioration et d'entraîner tout le personnel dans leur résolution.
fr.tips: Basée sur la méthode de gestion de la qualité PDCA (plan-do-check-act), la roue de Deming représente le cercle vertueux de l’amélioration continue.
fr.choice_V1W20u07B: De chacun selon ses moyens, à chacun selon ses besoins

en.header: The LEAN method is based on which principle?
en.klf: The LEAN method is centred on the theory of continuous improvement. A LEAN philosophy is based on respect, a desire to see problems as sources of improvement and an opportunity to train all members of staff in how to resolve any such problems.
en.tips: It’s based on the PDCA (plan-do-check-act) quality management method, also called the Deming Cycle, which represents a virtuous circle of continuous improvement.
en.choice_V1W20u07B: From each according to his ability, to each according to his needs
